snippet: Blue Bell Creameries will lay off more than a third of its work force following a series of listeria illnesses linked to its ice cream.
abstract: Blue Bell Creameries announces that it will let go over a third of its work force in wake of recall of all its products due to listeria concerns.
lead_paragraph: Blue Bell Creameries will lay off more than a third of its work force following a series of listeria illnesses linked to its ice cream.
